strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CHIRR_MASTERY_DESC: As Chirr, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CHIRR_GRANDMASTERY_DESC: As Chirr, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_CHIRR_MAID_DESC: As Chirr, cleanse three Lunar items in a single run.
